member.name: WS_REPEATING_HEADER_OPTION
member.summary: This enum is used to specify whether a header is expected to appear more than once in a message.

member.name: WS_REPEATING_HEADER_OPTION.WS_REPEATING_HEADER
member.summary: The header may appear more than once in the message.

member.name: WS_REPEATING_HEADER_OPTION.WS_SINGLETON_HEADER
member.summary: The header may appear at most once in the message. When this option is specified, the function ensures that the specified header appears at most once in the message.
